title: Packing for Love
description: Smart, sexy, globe trotting Alex isnâ€™t looking for love. She just wants to live her life to the fullest. A chance meeting with a handsome stranger catches her off guard. She tries to resist his magnetic pull but fails miserably. Are his rugged good looks and old-fashioned chivalry enough to win this jett-setting, fashionista over?
author: Anna Teshin
